requirements: History of good behavior at school
Report cards from the current / recent school
Confidential Evaluations from the current / recent school
Interviews with the applicant. At least one parent is required to accompany the applicant.
documents: Report cards from the current / recent school
Confidential Evaluations from the current / recent school
High School transcripts for grades 9, 10, and 11 (for IB DP applicants)
Detailed list of topics covered in each grade 11 IB DP class (for IB DP applicants)
Copy of the initial draft of Extended Essay (EE) (for IB DP applicants)
Progress on CAS requirements (for IB DP applicants)
Progress in TOK (for IB DP applicants)
Brent’s Resource Teacher Form (for students with special needs)
Documentation that provided the diagnoses (for students with special needs)
Official evaluations and assessment reports (Speech, OT, Psych Ed reports, etc.) (for students with special needs)
Individual Educational Plan (IEP) (for students with special needs)
Learning Plan (LP) (for students with special needs)
Relevant medical reports (for students with special needs)

process_steps.description: Click on the red circle labeled “Click Here to Apply” to create an account and complete an online application per child.
After completing an application and uploading the needed documents on the Requirements page, email admissionssecretary@brent.edu.ph to share that you are ready to proceed with the next step.

The official decision from Brent’s Admissions Committee is shared after the appointments, usually within a few business days. If Brent offers an acceptance, the accompanying fee is paid within five business days.
